#summary Build guide for example 30A EVSE

*Required Parts*

The following parts are available in the OpenEVSE Store
  * OpenEVSE Plus
  * OpenEVSE LCD
  * Relay 1 x DPST or 2 x SPST
  * CR 8420-1000-G GFCI coil
  * 30A Fuse Block
  * 2 x 30A Fuses
  * Ground Block
  * 16mm momentary push button
  * AC cord
  * Enclosure

Avaliable in the Leviton Store:
  * 30A Leviton J1772 cordset/handle
